Package etomica.modules.glass

Class DataSourceCorrelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.modules.glass.DataSourceCorrelation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceIndependent

    public class DataSourceCorrelation
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSourceIndependent
    Computes correlation of two input data streams, expected to each be 2 values. Correlation is computed as though the two input data are vectors.
